anidbcmdc.impl
Class AniDBUdpApiConnection

java.lang.Object
  anidbcmdc.impl.AniDBUdpApiConnection

public class AniDBUdpApiConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Title: AniDBUdpApiConnection

Description: Creates a connection to the AniDBUdpApi and handles available functions e.g auth, logout, addfile, ... http://www.anidb.net/client/udp-api.html

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

Version:
1.0
Author:
ExElNeT

Constructor Detail

AniDBUdpApiConnection

public AniDBUdpApiConnection(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             int localPort,
                             java.lang.String host,
                             int remotePort)
                      throws java.net.SocketException
Constructor for the connection to the Api Sets default values if not enough were given

Parameters:
username - - The username of the AniDB user
password - - The password of the AniDB user
localPort - - The port on which the client should operate *
host - - The address of the AniDBUdpApi
remotePort - - The port of the AniDBUdpApi
Throws:
java.net.SocketException - - Thrown if the connection to the Api failed
Method Detail

auth

public java.lang.String auth()
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             UnknownReplyException,
                             AniDBUdpApiException
Auths to the Api and returns a warning if one occured, else null

Returns:
- Warning if the api sent one else null
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - Thrown if the sending of the auth message failed
UnknownReplyException - - Thrown if the answer of the api is unknown
AniDBUdpApiException - - Thrown if the api sends an errormessage

logout

public void logout()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   UnknownReplyException,
                   AniDBUdpApiException
Logs out of the api

Throws:
java.io.IOException - - Thrown if the sending of the logout message failed
UnknownReplyException - - Thrown if the answer of the api is unknown
AniDBUdpApiException - - Thrown if the api sends an errormessage

getAnimeFileByEd2k

public AnimeFile getAnimeFileByEd2k(java.lang.String ed2kHash,
                                    int fileSize)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    UnknownReplyException,
                                    AniDBUdpApiException
Checks if file with hash and size is in the AniDB and asks for data about this file

Parameters:
ed2kHash - - Hash of the file in the AniDB
fileSize - - Filesize of the file in the AniDB
Returns:
- New AnimeFile with AniDB data about this file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - If the connection to the api failed
UnknownReplyException - - If the answer of the api was unknown
AniDBUdpApiException - - If the api send an error

                                        boolean onlyNew)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        UnknownReplyException,
                                        AniDBUdpApiException
Adds the AnimeFile to the users MyList Sets all available flags if possible

Parameters:
file - - The AnimeFile
Returns:
- A warning if the api sent one
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - If the connection to the api failed
UnknownReplyException - - If the answer of the api was unknown
